DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore the differences in efficacy and safety of sitagliptin,vildagliptin and saxagliptin and to find which one is more better in treating type 2 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Comparative Study of Sitagliptin,Vildagliptin and Saxagliptin
